doc.title: Domination of Tammy
doc.plot: Tammy has lost her purse at one of the many Beverly Hills stores she and her brother Ted were shopping in, and a blond passerby allows them to use the phone in her nearby home. Once Tammy calls boyfriend Alan to come by and bring money, the pair is drugged and humiliated. Alan arrives, and shares a similar fate by a brunette dominatrix, identified as the blonde's sister. Poor Tammy is forced to undergo several acts of depravity.
